name: BUGGINOUTERSPACE - WEBGL
description:
The mutant killer space roaches of planet BugginOut have infested your spaceship!

You must defeat them all before you return home or they will overthrow the planet with roaches everywhere!!

Defeat all of the roaches on a level then take the teleporter to the next level, I mean next area of your spaceship!!!

Controls:

ESC = Pause 

w/up arrow = move forwards

s/down arrow = move backwards 

a/left arrow = move to the left 

d/right arrow = move to the right 

left mouse = fire weapon 

right mouse = enter/exit aim mode 

middle mouse = (click) reload

###Playing in Fullscreen Mode is Recommended (so the mouse look doesn't get stuck)###
